plot: Bebe and girlfriend go shopping for new corsets. Harold sneaks into the corset shop and a customer asks him to take her measurements--a ticklish task, as the brash young man suddenly becomes playfully bashful.
title: Here Come the Girls
plot_es: Bebe and girlfriend go shopping for new corsets. Harold sneaks into the corset shop and a customer asks him to take her measurements--a ticklish task, as the brash young man suddenly becomes playfully bashful.
plot_en: Bebe and girlfriend go shopping for new corsets. Harold sneaks into the corset shop and a customer asks him to take her measurements--a ticklish task, as the brash young man suddenly becomes playfully bashful.
